short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, organize, group, bookmark, and consolidate all of your links into one dashboard PLUS a ToDo List!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LinkHub provides a dashboard for you to save, organize, group, bookmark, and consolidate all of your links into groups. 

Add new links to a group by clicking our Chrome Extension icon when you're on a webpage.

Everytime you open a new tab in Chrome, you'll see your LinkHub!

Click on a link on your LinkHub to launch it in a new tab.

Plus your first column is a ToDo List to keep track of your most important items to handle and never forget a task again!

➤Save Tabs in One Click
➤Organize Links by Project
➤Organize Links by Client
➤Organize Links by Job
➤Organize Links by Interests

Whatever works best for your workflow!
